name: Weapons Genius
description: Weapons Genius is a Simulator of building Weapons! In Weapons Genius you can build your own Weapon! You can build A big and powerfull gun, or you can build small but rapid gun, or you can build a gun with high accuracy!

reviews.review_text: I really loved the idea. I missed a game with 'Pimp my Gun' style. But this game is awful, let me tell you why:  First (as a IPSC shooter experience) you don't weld barrel with the receiver, stocks and sights. Most of the gun part is assembled not welded, so you can clean and mantain the weapon. I could let it go if it was a wrench instead of a welder.  Second, and this is why i didin't recomend this, the controls are awful. You press 'E' to pick and drop a weapon and it works sometimes and when works, it's when you're not intended to do it.  The final nail in the coffin was when i gathered money to buy a stock, i picked it up and tried to assemble in the bench, but instead he picked up the weapon (and dropped the stock on the floor). So i tried to place the weapon in the bench and he dropped the weapon and (get this) fell in the floor right where the stock was. And when that happened the stock disappeared on the floor. I just lost the equipment and the money.  So ok, i decided to let this pass and tried to go to the shooting range to get more money tobuy another stock (my balance was $1), so i picked the weapon (with some difficulty) and went to the door and pressed 'e' to go to the range. Now the thing gets fun: Instead to go to the range he dropped the weapon and it got stuck in the door and dissapeared!  And guess what? I have no money, no weapon, and i can't get more money to build another weapon because i don't have any to go to the range. So now every time i boot the game up i spawn in the workshop with empty bench and no money. Thank dev...  If this game get more polished and clean the bugs out, i'm sure i'll give a good mark. But for now, avoid this game.

Waste of time, abandoned project (Beta V1 was released last year, with no word from the developer about Beta V2). Only one receiver available, not much gameplay. mediocre amount of parts with the same 4 models, different prices & stats.  You can't upgrade weapons once you attach the parts, i.e buying a $70 barrel, getting money and buying a $300 one, that you cant replace.  Rock music constantly playing in a loop, 2 levels & they're both super bland & uninteresting.   3/10 - I got a kick from making fun of the game - Beta V2 is a myth - Developer nowhere to be seen, probably abandoned the game

This game is AWESOME. Love how you can build your own guns, shoot them & modify them!  Pros:   - Quite unique. I haven't seen any other weapon-builder PC games.  - Modular. You don't buy guns as a whole, you build them.  - Choice of music. Music could be annoying, but since it's not crappy pop music, I'll give it a plus.  Cons:  - VERY Buggy. See bottom of review!  - Unity? Props for creating this, but doing games from scratch is harder. When I see that Unity loading screen, I think the game might be bad. (Although, this was false haha)  --------------------------------------------------------  Bugs:  - Pressing E on the training door only works in certain positions.  I had my awesome gun, spent about $5k on it. It said 'Press E to enter training', I did so, and I dropped my weapon. I dropped it out of the door, and there was no way to retrieve it. I tried exiting to main menu and loading in again, it was in the same place.   - Physics can be pretty bad. Sometimes, they limit what you can do.   - Silencers don't fit on all barrels. I can understand this in real life, but I think this is actually a bug. I bought a cheap silencer and couldn't put it on because the blue draw on the gun desk was in the way / couldn't fit on the barrel.   - Pressing E on the gun desk doesn't always place it, sometimes it drops it under the desk and you have to start all over again because it won't let you pick your weapon up.   - Running / walking is absurd. Slow, bouncy, etc.   - The reload sound goes longer than the actual reload. I can shoot around the end of the sound.  --------------------------------------------------  Ways around bugs / suggestions:   - Make pressing 'SHIFT + E' on something work from any range.  - On the market, put a warning on barrels that don't allow silencers below the price in red: 'Doesn't allow silencers.'  - Make walking smooth without what's causing it to look like a chicken that's bhopping.  Suggestions:   - A use for the anvil.  - Reload button refreshes the market. Right now, it doesn't do anything.  - Mail button doesn't do anything. I don't know what it's for, but eh.  - Able to texture parts or change the material before you buy it. Buying a wooden barrel on a metal gun doesn't look the best.  - OTHER WAYS TO MAKE MONEY! Shooting a gun at training isn't the best way to make money. What about trading guns and etc? That's be awesome.  - Muzzles  - More magazines. Drums, etc  - More designs for different parts. There are only a few models for different ranges of the same part type.  -----------------------------  Thanks for the game, loving it. Bug fixes and added suggestions would be top-notch.
